turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I could really use some coffee. Can you place an order for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. Starbucks as usual? Which location?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one in the NBC Tower in the Loop.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm trying to cut down on carbs. What are some of Starbucks' keto-friendly options?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They have several skinny syrups, which are basically all sugar alternatives.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Not a huge fan of fake sugar flavor. What are some other options?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You want hot or cold drinks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You know I usually want cold, but it's freezing right now.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You could always go with an americano or a simple cappuccino.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A cappuccino sounds good. What are the milk options?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: There are six: whole milk, 2 percent, nonfat, almond, coconut, soy,

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Whole milk is your best option.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How many carbs for a grande cappuccino with whole milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright. Order me a tall cappuccino with whole milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It will be ready for pickup in 12 minutes. A receipt will be sent via text.
